sentences.en: Chainwheels are sized for 100 lb. maximum rim pull.
sentences.cn: 链轮设计边缘拉力最大为100磅.

sentences.en: Engine output is 163 hp with peak torque of 214 lb - ft.
sentences.cn: 发动机输出功率为163峰值214磅英尺扭矩马力.

sentences.en: Experiments show that molecules of both compounds are present as monomers in LB film.
sentences.cn: 实验表明,两种分子以单体形式存在于LB膜中.

sentences.en: His onions cost 9p a lb wholesale; packing and transport costs 10p.
sentences.cn: 他的洋葱批发价每磅9便士；打包送货的话要10便士。

sentences.en: I compete at 242 lb and in the 275 lb classes now.
sentences.cn: 我现在在242磅级和275磅级比赛.

sentences.en: Langmuir - Blodgett ( LB ) technique is an advanced technique to prepare well - ordered ultra thin films in molecular level.
sentences.cn: LB 膜技术是在分子水平上制备有序分子超薄膜的先进技术.

sentences.en: LB series preparation tank mxes syrup, edible essence, edibleadditive and water.
sentences.cn: LB系列调配罐将糖将 、 食用香精 、 食用添加剂及水调配均匀.

sentences.en: LB subsidy includes all revenue and vehicle costs but excludes capital investment.
sentences.cn: LB津贴包括所有收入和车辆成本,但是排除资本投入.

sentences.en: Lime requirements by this process are quite high, up to 300 lb / ton of produced.
sentences.cn: 这一过程石灰耗量十分大, 每生产1吨?醺叽?00磅.

sentences.en: Motherboard part number identification stickers ( starting with LB or MB ).
sentences.cn: 主板零件编号识别标签 ( 开始的LB或甲基溴 ).

sentences.en: My fish average 2 lb 8 oz and I've had two eight-pounders.
sentences.cn: 我的鱼平均每条重2磅8盎司，还有过两条重8磅的。

sentences.en: One angler landed fish of 10 lb and 9 lb on the same day.
sentences.cn: 一名垂钓者在同一天分别钓到了10磅和9磅重的鱼。

sentences.en: The baby was born three months early weighing only 3 lb 5oz.
sentences.cn: 婴儿早产3个月，体重只有3磅5盎司。

sentences.en: The jockey turned the scales at 80 lb.
These fish vary in weight from 3 lb to 5 lb.
sentences.cn: 这些鱼的重量从3磅到5磅不等.
